headline: Otis Worldwide (OTIS): Reassessing Valuation After an Earnings Beat and a Cautious Analyst Price Target Cut
summary: Otis Worldwide (OTIS) just delivered quarterly results that topped revenue and operating income forecasts, yet the stock slipped as valuation focused analyst updates signaled more cautious expectations from here. See our latest analysis for Otis Worldwide. The muted 1 day share price move sits against a 1 year total shareholder return of around negative 5 percent and a still positive 3 year total shareholder return in the high teens. This suggests long term holders have done reasonably well...
